title: I CANT SEE THE SKIN SHARD MENU?!!
body: I was going to disenchant a skin shard, but the problem is the menu where it lets you do that does not pop up. It just shows the name of the skin and the rarity of it. PLS HELP RITO.

replies.body: So, you're able to see the loot screen but when you click on the shard itself that popup menu never appears? If that's the case, you may need to double check that your client doesn't have any damaged or corrupted files pertaining to the loot menu. I'd try running a quick repair through the client options first, but hit me back up if that doesn't help!
